author: andschwa
body: This cmdlet is used by all DSC cmdlets currently on windows.  This cmdlet needs to be able to duplicate that E2E scenario.  \* MSDN  this cmdlet relies upon the $PSUICulture automatic variable.  This variable needs to be set  VSO create date - 12/11/2015 9:22:00
title: Test and Fix Import-LocalizedData
